overview: Samantha is a qualified Fine Arts and Antiques Chartered Surveyor and Fellow of the Gemmological Association. Before joining borro Samantha was a General Valuer based in the London and European Valuations Department at Bonhams Auctioneers, she was also Head of Department, European and Oriental Costume and Textiles for the Bonhams Group and Head of Sale for European Costume and Textiles with Christies.
